Introduction

Aesther is a 5-member South Korean virtual girl group under Charon Universe. The group consists of Arisa, Karin, Eris, Mika, and Ellie. They debuted on July 31, 2023, with their digital single “Hands Up”. On April 26, 2024, it was announced that member Mika's contract had been terminated.
